SEARCH
Module com.example.turinggame
Package Model.Validator

Class CompareOneDigit

java.lang.Object
Model.Validator.Validator
Model.Validator.CompareOneDigit
public class CompareOneDigit extends Validator
The CompareOneDigit class is a specific type of Validator that compares a single digit of a given code to a specific value or condition. It supports different validation rules based on the validator number.

  • Constructor Details

    • CompareOneDigit

      public CompareOneDigit(int nbValidator, Code codeSecret)
      Constructor for CompareOneDigit. Initializes a new CompareOneDigit validator with a specific number and secret code.
      Parameters:
      nbValidator - The number of the validator. Determines the rule for comparison.
      codeSecret - The secret code against which comparisons are to be made.

  • Method Details

    • verify

      public boolean verify(Code code)
      Verifies the given code against the secret code based on the validator's number. The method of verification varies depending on the validator number.
      Specified by:
      verify in class Validator
      Parameters:
      code - The code to be verified.
      Returns:
      true if the code satisfies the validator's condition, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      TuringException - If the provided code is null.
      IllegalArgumentException - If the validator number is not recognized.

    • stringCategory

      public String stringCategory()
      Provides a string representation of the validator's category based on its number.
      Specified by:
      stringCategory in class Validator
      Returns:
      A string describing the validator's rule.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the validator number is not valid.
